name: eyed3
description: A wrapper for ID3 manipulation using eyeD3
readme:
# node-eyed3

A wrapper for reading and updating ID3 data of (e.g.) MP3 files using eyeD3.

## Notice

Make sure you have `eyeD3` installed.

## Running tests

    $ npm install
    $ make test
